name: Idle 2 The Horror Game
description:
The official sequal for Idle the horror game is here!

After the mysterious death of your convicted father, you find yourself in the hands of a caring foster mother. You have everything you wanted and deserved. But why should you really trust her? She isn't your real mother after all. And your best friend Lewis's words of encouragement aren't helping either.. But you trust him, don't you?

Idle 2 is the next chapter in the idle universe waiting to be pieced together. What is really happening within this crooked story?

Note: Idle 2 is a recreation and remastered version of my original game "Obsolete 2 foggy perception".  Hope everyone enjoys!
